root.name: Best Threshold
root.description: Choose the best auto thresholding technique for your data. Ported from Auto Threshold plugin in ImageJ by G. Landini (plus others, see documentation).
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2013-10-10 13:56:54
- Version 1.3.0.1 Date 2013-08-06 17:28:37
* Can now display ROIs
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2013-07-29 11:18:16
Corrected Double issue
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2013-07-18 17:05:16
* rollback
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2013-07-01 18:00:06
* corrected some issues with double
- Version 1.0.1.1 Date 2013-01-18 11:07:09
Retrocompatibility was broken since last version, now corrected back for backward compatibility.
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2013-01-11 15:54:35
* added a function for scripting to make it easier to use this plugin
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-12-06 17:21:43
Compatible with Blocks.
